Got this at a substantial discount from the regular price, which makes it acceptable to me. Actually labeled Cherokee Workwear Professional. 28.5" inseam for petite, exactly as described. I work in a hospital. This pants is perfect. This is my 4th pants of a different color.  The green color is just right, a true green. Very comfortable, secure sewing for different movements and abrupt movements. Love the side pockets and the leg pocket. I do not use the two back pockets. Plenty of pockets to put pens, notepads, a phone, paper clips, toothbrush, floss, tooth paste. I put these things in my pockets. I recommend it for health care workers.

These Cherokee scrubs are my favorite! I have them in every color. They run large, so order down a size or two. Pockets are easily accessible and the colors don’t fade after many, many washes. Love that they’re lightweight with material that is breathable. I love this product!!!

I'm a new nurse graduate and have worn these over a 4 month period.  I really like these pants. They're easy to move in, fit well, and look fresh.  I also bought a matching top and enjoy it as well.  At the same time, I also bought the much more expensive Med Couture joggers and matching top.  The Med Couture top has a badge holder and was torn within 2 wearings.  Their jogger pants are not comfortable to move in.  Given the price, comfort, and quality I would recommend the Cherokee Workwear Professional Stretch Drawstring pant and top.
